comments:

java.version=1.4.2_01

i should also state that this primarily occurs when typing ctrl-k consecutive
(sp) times, but also happens w/ a few second pause between key presses.
Which build of Eclipse are you using?
3.0 M5, however i also noticed this problem in M4 as well, but did not report.

Just after M5, I fixed bug 16011 which I believe is the same problem you are 
encountering.

Could you retry with I20031126:

http://download.eclipse.org/downloads/drops/I-I20031126-200311260800/index.php

that seems to have fixed it, thanks much!!
 
how "stable" would you rate this integration build? would it be possible to plug
the swt.jar from this build into 3.0 M5 and use it as a "patch"?

I think copying the SWT jar and dll back into M5 (or just take the whole 
org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.0 plugin from the integation build) would be more 
stable than using the latest integration build.

Since your problem is fixed, I will mark this bug report as a duplicate of the 
previous one.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16011 ***
